dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
M. Long
J. Wang
Z. Gao
P. S. Yu
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset containing sequences of moving handwritten digits, where each frame consists of two digits bouncing within a 64x64 grid. The dataset is used to evaluate the predictive learning capabilities of models by predicting future frames based on previous ones.
dcterms:title: Moving MNIST Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Schuldt
I. Laptev
B. Caputo
dcterms:description: A dataset containing video clips of human actions, including walking, jogging, running, boxing, hand waving, and hand clapping, captured in various scenarios with different backgrounds and clothing. Each video clip has an average length of four seconds.
dcterms:title: KTH Action Dataset
